input.sentences: this woman traveled around the world .
however | she did it in eighty days .
there was a lot of planning involved for the trip .

output.sentences: Sharing her world views this woman experienced while traveling.
She had gone in eighty days around the world.
Today she was holding a presentation.
She shared how the trip took planning but was a lot of fun.
She shared her venture and lastly her next concept for the book.
